title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. BTW, what does the message mean?
OB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection, I receive the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open a binary project. 2. Select a class or package from the project. 3. Press F4 on the selection.
